author: Mathias
long_description:
Adds a delay between each death, to mitigate abuse of respawn, teleportation to a predefined area, playing recklessly, but allows user to take breaks in between in the case of the death. Maybe it also provides an alternative to losing items on death. Optimized for 5.0.0-5.4.0.

Credits to Coder12 for being original developer of mod.

To change the delay time, go to init.lua file and change the number value located near the top of the script for:
*local initial_timeout*

Awards/Achievements

Arctic Code Vault Contributor Selectee, 2020
name: death_timer
short_description: Timer that adds a delay between deaths.
title: Death Timer
